alert.note: Alert for Claiborne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:37AM CDT until June 10 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR EASTERN CLAIBORNE...JEFFERSON AND WESTERN HINDS COUNTIES... At 1136 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Carpenter to near Fayette to near Natchez, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Mcnair around 1140 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Learned. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
